TopicTitle: A way to open landing legs etc. while building

Articles.Content: so you can see if they will be effective
Um, right click the leg, I think you'll find what you are looking for.
tbh solar panels could use that functionality too, but the landing legs do work.

Love the leg extension in the VAB. I'd love to see that extended to solar panels and antennae. (And maybe allow ladders to retract, though that's much less of an issue I think.)

-- Steve

As there is for everything these days, there's a mod for that: TweakableEverything. Though it goes a little farther and allows you to tweak some things at greater than 100%, if you just stay below that it allows you do do a lot of things that - considering Squad added tweaking to the game - seem like they should be in stock.

Including tweaking solar panels open or closed, decopuler ejection force, and toggling reaction wheels on and off in the VAB.

If everything in that mod (except the cheaty parts where you can tweak things to be better than stock) was put in 0.24, I'd be happy and only surprised that they weren't in 0.23.
